    • Constructor Detail

      • GamePanel

        public GamePanel(MainFrame mainFrame)
        Constructor for GamePanel.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - JFrame where this GamePanel will be set.
        Precondition:
        JFrame for which this GamePanel is set must exist.
        Postcondition:
        JFrame is set with GamePanel.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(ConnectFourListener connectFourListener)
        Add ConnectFourListener object to every cell.
        Parameters:
        connectFourListener - ConnectFourListener which will listen to activities in GamePanel.
        Precondition:
        ConnectFourListener must exist.
        Postcondition:
        GamePanel adds listener object.

      • getColumn

        public int getColumn(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Returns the column number for a certain cell in game board.
        Parameters:
        button - Cell for which column information is required of.
        Returns:
        Returns the column number of cell.
        Precondition:
        Button parameter must be valid and within limits of game board.

      • set

        public void set(int column,
                int row,
                int player,
                boolean isMonoChrome)
        Sets the cell with coin for specified player number.
        Parameters:
        column - Cell column number.
        row - Cell row number.
        player - Player number who is putting in the coin at this location.
        isMonoChrome - Boolean flag for Monochrome game.
        Precondition:
        Inputs must be within cell board array and player number must be valid.
        Postcondition:
        The Cell with specified column and row is highlighted with player's coin.

      • showWinningTokens

        public void showWinningTokens(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> tokens)
        Displays the winning tokens in special effects.
        Parameters:
        tokens - Cells that contains the winning move.
        Precondition:
        Game has been finished and won by some player.
        Postcondition:
        The cells that have won the gave will be repainted with special cell effects.

      • restart

        public void restart(MainFrame mainFrame)
        Restarts the game by re-drawing the GamePanel.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - JFrame where this GamePanel is set.
        Precondition:
        JFrame for which this GamePanel is set must exist.
        Postcondition:
        JFrame re-draws GamePanel.

      • getButtons

        public java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JButton> getButtons()
        Returns all the buttons in GamePanel.
        Returns:
        List of buttons in GamePanel.
        Precondition:
        None.

      • highlightHint

        public javax.swing.Timer highlightHint(int row,
                                       int col)
        Makes the Hint cell blink and returns the Timer object that controls it.
        Parameters:
        row - X-cordinate of hint cell.
        col - Y-cordinate of hitn cell.
        Returns:
        Timer object that controls the blinking of this cell.
        Precondition:
        Requires valid x, y cordinates within board for hint cell given by AI.

      • repaintHintCell

        public void repaintHintCell()
        Resets and repaints the blinking hint cell highlighted in highlightHint method.
        Precondition:
        highlightHint method has been called.
        Postcondition:
        The blinking effects in hint cell will be turned off.
